ygData.subject: Warning!Lore Items
ygData.msgSnippet: WARNING!~@#$ LORE ITEMS will be gone after u drop them,dont know is it I OVER BLUR or what.Remember guys..LORE items are never to be dropped even if u put in
ygData.messageBody:
WARNING!~@#$
LORE ITEMS will be gone after u drop them,dont know is it I OVER BLUR or what.Remember guys..LORE items are never to be dropped even if u put in bag.As some of u guys already know,I knew this the HARD way.I lost my BBC and SBS because of this[my whole fighter's career is gone] and I hope nobody will have the same fate as me.

a very saddened warrior
Kenven
